StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [usp_MyErrorLog]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body: AS PRINT 'Error ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(50), ERROR_NUMBER()) + ', Severity ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(5), ERROR_SEVERITY()) + ', State ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(5), ERROR_STATE()) + ', Line ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(5), ERROR_LINE()); PRINT ERROR_MESSAGE();
